item.title: The twitter plugin that I wish existed
item.description: So I have been using twitter for a minute. I really enjoy it. I got all my friends on it and quite a number of my family using it. Its fun. I love getting updates and what not. However, the one thing I wish I could do with twitter is set the status of my various IM clients by sending a “tweet” to twitter. It would be awesome. You could then have your AIM status or Gtalk status show your latest twitter.
